title: who owned the motel in Belville that was a drug haven .  I believe they are in prison ...
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20120805/ARTICLES/120809845/0/search?p=all&tc=pgall He served his term and was released. He's not currently listed as being an inmate in either the Brunswick County jail or the state prison system.
